entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 30
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
